org.miniauth.oauth.credential.mapper

Class OAuthLocalTokenCredentialMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miniauth.oauth.credential.mapper.AbstractOAuthCredentialMapper
      • org.miniauth.oauth.credential.mapper.OAuthLocalTokenCredentialMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CredentialMapper, DynamicCredentialMapper, DynamicOAuthCredentialMapper, DynamicOAuthTokenCredentialMapper, OAuthCredentialMapper, OAuthTokenCredentialMapper

    public final class OAuthLocalTokenCredentialMapper
extends AbstractOAuthCredentialMapper
implements DynamicOAuthTokenCredentialMapper
    Service that returns a "token secret" given an access token. The token credential pairs are stored in a local "registry" (HashMap). (This is just an exemplary implementation. Not for production use, except for a very simple use case.)
